channel.title: Hugo on 豆子.学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on 豆子.学习笔记

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: 新建文章 hugo new post/blog-name.md 运行hugo hugo server --watch --buildDrafts 部署到GitHub Pages hugo --theme=hyde --baseUrl="http://binbean.github.io/" cd public git init git remote add origin https://github.com/binbean/binbean.github.io.git git add -A git commit -m "first commit" git push -u origin master
